title: Rank Rewards (Clear up) - Are ranked borders queue specific 'yes'??

embed.description: The final push is here: whether you triumph together alongside familiar teammates or take matters into your own hands on the solo ladder. With the end of season comes ranked rewards featuring the Victorious Maokai skin, loading screen border division markers, and all new rewards for the most elite players at the top of the ladder.

body:
A while ago when riot made the '2016 ranked season ends soon' article on of the questions was "are ranked borders queue specific" which  riot answered yes.

[](https://imgur.com/a/9oXED)

I just someone to clarify what this meant.
As I though that it mean if u have a solo queue emblem on you account you would have something on the next seasons ranked border to show how you made it to x rank as a solo player and the same if you made your rank from dynamic queue?

replies.body:
The queue specific refers to 5v5 Ranked and 3v3 Ranked, rather than your classification in the dyna queue system, making it effectively irrelevant on OCE since we don't have ranked TT. It just means that if you were Gold in Ranked 5s, but unranked in 3s, you won't see any border when you queue up for 3s, this hasn't changed since previous seasons.

That said, they may choose to have some kind of cosmetic difference to distinguish where you acquired your rank for the sake of normals, which shows whatever your highest rank was.

They may make some distinction based on what your were classified as this season, but as of yet there is no mention of it (that I am aware of).
